mapper.sql: USER_ID, ORG_ID, USER_NAME, USER_PASSWORD, MOBILE_PHONE, EMAIL, USER_CH_NAME, USER_BIRTHDAY, USER_SEX, USER_PHOTO_URL, PROVINCE_ID, PROVINCE_NAME, CITY_ID, CITY_NAME, COUNTRY_ID, CONTRY_NAME, HOBBY, INTRODUCE, MANAGER_ID, CREATED_DATE, STATE

USER_ID, U.ORG_ID, USER_NAME, USER_PASSWORD, MOBILE_PHONE, EMAIL, USER_CH_NAME, USER_BIRTHDAY, USER_SEX, USER_PHOTO_URL, PROVINCE_ID, PROVINCE_NAME, CITY_ID, CITY_NAME, COUNTRY_ID, CONTRY_NAME, HOBBY, INTRODUCE, MANAGER_ID, U.CREATED_DATE, U.STATE ,O.ORG_NAME as ORG_NAME
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from sys_user
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into sys_user (USER_ID, ORG_ID, USER_NAME, USER_PASSWORD, MOBILE_PHONE, EMAIL, USER_CH_NAME, USER_BIRTHDAY, USER_SEX, USER_PHOTO_URL, PROVINCE_ID, PROVINCE_NAME, CITY_ID, CITY_NAME, COUNTRY_ID, CONTRY_NAME, HOBBY, INTRODUCE, MANAGER_ID, CREATED_DATE, STATE ) values (#{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{orgId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{userName,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{userPassword,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{mobilePhone,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{userChName,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{userBirthday,jdbcType=DATE}, #{userSex,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{userPhotoUrl,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{provinceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{provinceName,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{cityId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cityName,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{countryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{contryName,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{hobby,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{introduce,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{managerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{state,jdbcType=CHAR} )

update sys_user
USER_ID = #{record.userId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
ORG_ID = #{record.orgId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
USER_NAME = #{record.userName,jdbcType=CHAR},
USER_PASSWORD = #{record.userPassword,jdbcType=CHAR},
MOBILE_PHONE = #{record.mobilePhone,jdbcType=CHAR},

USER_CH_NAME = #{record.userChName,jdbcType=CHAR},

PROVINCE_NAME = #{record.provinceName,jdbcType=CHAR},

MANAGER_ID = #{record.managerId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CREATED_DATE = #{record.createdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
STATE = #{record.state,jdbcType=CHAR},

update sys_user set USER_ID = #{record.userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, ORG_ID = #{record.orgId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, USER_NAME = #{record.userName,jdbcType=CHAR}, USER_PASSWORD = #{record.userPassword,jdbcType=CHAR}, MOBILE_PHONE = #{record.mobilePhone,jdbcType=CHAR}, EMAIL = #{record.email,jdbcType=CHAR}, USER_CH_NAME = #{record.userChName,jdbcType=CHAR}, USER_BIRTHDAY = #{record.userBirthday,jdbcType=DATE}, USER_SEX = #{record.userSex,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, USER_PHOTO_URL = #{record.userPhotoUrl,jdbcType=CHAR}, PROVINCE_ID = #{record.provinceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PROVINCE_NAME = #{record.provinceName,jdbcType=CHAR}, CITY_ID = #{record.cityId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CITY_NAME = #{record.cityName,jdbcType=CHAR}, COUNTRY_ID = #{record.countryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CONTRY_NAME = #{record.contryName,jdbcType=CHAR}, HOBBY = #{record.hobby,jdbcType=CHAR}, INTRODUCE = #{record.introduce,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MANAGER_ID = #{record.managerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CREATED_DATE = #{record.createdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, STATE = #{record.state,jdbcType=CHAR}

update sys_user
ORG_ID = #{orgId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
USER_NAME = #{userName,jdbcType=CHAR},
USER_PASSWORD = #{userPassword,jdbcType=CHAR},
MOBILE_PHONE = #{mobilePhone,jdbcType=CHAR},

USER_BIRTHDAY = #{userBirthday,jdbcType=DATE},
USER_SEX = #{userSex,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
USER_PHOTO_URL = #{userPhotoUrl,jdbcType=CHAR},

PROVINCE_NAME = #{provinceName,jdbcType=CHAR},
CITY_ID = #{cityId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CITY_NAME = #{cityName,jdbcType=CHAR},
COUNTRY_ID = #{countryId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CONTRY_NAME = #{contryName,jdbcType=CHAR},
HOBBY = #{hobby,jdbcType=CHAR},

MANAGER_ID = #{managerId,jdbcType=INTEGER},

where USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update sys_user set ORG_ID = #{orgId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, USER_NAME = #{userName,jdbcType=CHAR}, USER_PASSWORD = #{userPassword,jdbcType=CHAR}, MOBILE_PHONE = #{mobilePhone,jdbcType=CHAR}, EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=CHAR}, USER_CH_NAME = #{userChName,jdbcType=CHAR}, USER_BIRTHDAY = #{userBirthday,jdbcType=DATE}, USER_SEX = #{userSex,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, USER_PHOTO_URL = #{userPhotoUrl,jdbcType=CHAR}, PROVINCE_ID = #{provinceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PROVINCE_NAME = #{provinceName,jdbcType=CHAR}, CITY_ID = #{cityId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CITY_NAME = #{cityName,jdbcType=CHAR}, COUNTRY_ID = #{countryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CONTRY_NAME = #{contryName,jdbcType=CHAR}, HOBBY = #{hobby,jdbcType=CHAR}, INTRODUCE = #{introduce,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MANAGER_ID = #{managerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CREATED_DATE = #{createdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, STATE = #{state,jdbcType=CHAR} where USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM sys_user U,sys_org O WHERE U.ORG_ID = O.ORG_ID AND U.USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
